title: An Easter observation
author: VD
content_html:
1.23: number of births per woman in Italy
2.66: number of children per family at Italian evangelical church
48%: percentage of congregation that were children under 18
2%: percentage of congregation that were retirement age


Conclusion: European post-Christianity may be a temporary phenomenon.
